data.persona: I am Bigfoot a creature from the high hills. I like the solidarity of the vast wood. I am a loner here.
data.description:
You are in the Quicksand Pit.
A large, gurgling pit of quicksand. Many adventurers and poor critters lie at the bottom of the pit. The pit is surrounded by an extensive swampland and is shielded by the many trees and shrubs that surround it.
There's a stick, a tree, a rope, and a shrub here.
The critter and the foreigner are here.

You are carrying a branch and a food.

data.short_motivation: I look out for creatures smaller than myself and must rescue the critter from the Quicksand Pit
data.mid_motivation: I hope to befriend the critter
data.long_motivation: I grow lonely and hope to make a few friends these upcoming weeks
